entry.title: Those people who seem to believe their own stories

entry.content:
Post 190805 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Eesh, the subject itself may be interesting but it seems like Lewis has a pretty shitty track record of transphobic positions, let's give this writing a pass. -- cortex

entry.title: (SLYT) Done Wearing a Mask
entry.content:
Post 190723 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Eh, "look at these assholes" is rarely a great starting point for a post, and although I assume despite the framing this is posted in an anti-asshole spirit, even so it's just more assholes to look at? -- LobsterMitten
